name: The Ultra-Teen Team
description:
This is a game I made for the "Super Powers" theme for the Drifty gamejam.
As such, everything can be experienced within half an hour. Made with RPG Maker Bakin.

A controller is recommended but you can play without one.  Pressing F4 will minimize or maximize the window in and out of Fullscreen.

I will most likely not continue this game, as I have ideas for more that I'd like to get started on soon. And these super-power fantasy adventures really can just go on forever, so try appreciate this adventure for what it is.
